about.title: About Me
about.firstParagraph: I'm a full-stack software developer with a passion for creating engaging digital experiences. With a solid background in front-end and graphic design, I combine technical skills with an aesthetic vision to develop innovative solutions.
about.secondParagraph: My goal is to develop modern and scalable solutions that exceed expectations. I value collaboration and teamwork, as well as sharing knowledge with other developers.
